extendedInfo.description: Cruise Finder â¢ by iCruise.com is one of the most comprehensive cruise vacation-planning apps in the travel industry. This award-winning cruise app app provides detailed cruise information on 32 different cruise lines, 310 ships including staterooms photos and deck plans, 25 destinations, and 25,000+ itineraries complete with route maps. Best of all, this is a Free App!Sign up for our email newsletter from your iPhone and receive a voucher for up to $50 off your next cruise vacation with iCruise.com*****2011 Travel Weekly Magellan Award Winner for AppsLos Angeles Times: "This must-have app has itineraries for every major cruise line, searches for hot cruise deals and includes photos, deck plans, etc., for more than 220 cruise ships"***** Cruise Finder â¢ features include:Ã¯ Cruise Finder â¢ Quick Search ToolsÃ¯ 32 Cruise LinesÃ¯ 310 + Cruise ShipsÃ¯ 25,000+ Itineraries with Day-by-Day Descriptions and Route MapsÃ¯ Live online pricing, availability & bookingÃ¯ Port PhotosÃ¯ Stateroom Descriptions and PhotosÃ¯ Deck PlansÃ¯ Hot Cruise Deals - Last Minute, Senior & Holiday OffersÃ¯ Cruise CalendarsÃ¯ My Favorites - Save Your Favorite Ships, Cruise Lines, and ItinerariesÃ¯ Port Directions, Parking and MapsÃ¯ Port WeatherÃ¯ Cruise NewsÃ¯ Share via Email, Facebook and TwitterÃ¯ And moreHighlights:Cruise Finder â¢Our intelligent cruise search allows you to find a cruise by Destination, Departure Date, Departure Port, Cruise Line and Cruise Ship . . . with each selection offering you a real time number of cruises that match your request.Itineraries include:Ã¯ AlaskaÃ¯ BahamasÃ¯ BermudaÃ¯ CaribbeanÃ¯ EuropeÃ¯ HawaiiÃ¯ MediterraneanÃ¯ Panama CanalÃ¯ South AmericaÃ¯ South PacificÃ¯ And moreCruise LinesSearch 32 cruise lines alphabetically or by type . . . Contemporary, Premium, Deluxe, Luxury, and Niche/Specialty cruise lines. View their ships, a brief profile and sailing calendars.Cruise Lines include:Ã¯ Azamara Club CruisesÃ¯ Carnival Cruise LineÃ¯ Celebrity CruisesÃ¯ Costa CruisesÃ¯ Cunard LineÃ¯ Disney Cruise LineÃ¯ Holland AmericaÃ¯ PrincessÃ¯ Norwegian Cruise LineÃ¯ Royal CaribbeanÃ¯ Regent Seven Seas CruisesÃ¯ And moreCruise ShipsSort 310 cruise ships alphabetically, by cruise line, by size and ship rating. Then view Ship Stats, Itineraries, Cabin Photos and Descriptions, and Deck plans.Ships include:Ã¯ Quantum of the Seas & Anthem of the SeasÃ¯ Norwegian Breakaway and Norwegian GetawayÃ¯ Royal PrincessÃ¯ Oasis of the Seas and Allure of the SeasÃ¯ Disney Magic and Disney FantasyÃ¯ Celebrity Solstice and EquinoxÃ¯ Norwegian EpicÃ¯ Carnival Dream and Carnival BrezeÃ¯ River CruisesÃ¯ And 300+ morePlease share your ideas for future enhancements.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like seeing the destinations on tge pics but are small and stretched which makes it hard to see. Othrr then that good. Samsung galaxy S4
reviews.author: Marcos Rivera

reviews.title: Good for research, bad for pricing...
reviews.comment: Great information for researching anything and everything about available cruises.  Unfortunately, the price of the cruise I\'m considering, as shown in this app,matched the cruise lines online price, but then started going up within 24 hours of first using the app.  The cruise lines website, however, shows the price dropping.
reviews.author: Nick Weaver

reviews.title: ICruise
reviews.comment: \"Image not available\" appeared on every screen for every shop when checking deck plans on my Samsing Galaxy Note. Completely useless app. And my favourite  Fred Olsen Cruise Lines not listed.
reviews.author: Edwin Bonner

reviews.title: Zeer goede app!!
reviews.comment: Alle informatie die je nodig hebt kan gemakkelijk gevonden worden en ziet er nog goed uit ook.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Research ok, prices BAD!!!!!
reviews.comment: Title pretty much says it all.
reviews.author: Mershawn Foley

reviews.title: Wonderful app!
reviews.comment: This app has all you need......

reviews.comment: Nothing special but okay

reviews.title: Thank
reviews.comment: Thank for the update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love hate
reviews.comment: I love how easy it is to search for cruises but as soon as i go to book it, it gives me a screen that said the page is no longer available or moved... I\'m leaving soon and really need this... too bad it doesn\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just a great app to have when planning your next cruise. Very informative and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cruisetastic!!!!!
reviews.comment: Great app very informative regards ships&ports I highly recommend this app but don\'t take my word for it just download it and you\'ll see what I mean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute perfection!
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe this app is free- it\'d be a great value even for a price. Packed with relevant details, all needed info, & price details. Also the prettiest layout of any application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: for now 4, but...
reviews.comment: Great app, from me you have 5 star (now 4) if you put option where is the ship right now and some cameras from vesell. Thats good for people who work on the ship and for my family. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MIKEY
reviews.comment: VERU NICE APP PLENTY OF INFORMATION
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs some fixes
reviews.comment: Changing a single search variable results in everything getting reset. Need some sorting capabilities too. If I want a cruise at the end of the month there is no descending sort. I end up scrolling through too many pages for results.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best Cruise Finder app available

reviews.title: More ports ?
reviews.comment: I can\'t find ports in Singapore or Malaysia or in that region, any idea why?

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Really helpful..
